Shimla Manali Escape

5 Days 4 Nights
From 10,000/-

Sightseeing
Camping
Rafting

  Accomodation : Camp + Hotel

  Local Sightseeing

  Food : Breakfast / Dinner

  Places : Shimla, Kullu ,Manali ,Solang Valley ,Kasol

  Min-Group Size : 2


SHIMLA MANALI ESCAPE




 Overview

The SHIMLA MANALI ESCAPE TRIP is almost a week-long trip of 5 Days and 4 Nights. This trip is meant for escaping from the stress and filling the soul and body with new positive energy. Enjoy it while you can, and be on this trip, create new "Trippy" memories and be positive, refreshed and again.

  ACTIVITIES & PLACES YOU WILL BE EXPLORING


MANALI
SHIMLA
RAFTING
KASOL

 Escape Journey

  • DAY 0 - DELHI-Shimla/Manali BY A/C VOLVO BUS

    Arrive Delhi Volvo Bus stand, Board the Volvo bus at 05 PM and start your ever memorable Shimla Manali tour package . Overnight travel by Volvo Bus

  • DAY 1 - Shimla sightseeing and hotel overnight stay

    Places:
    1. Shimla Mall Road
    2. Kufri
    3. Jakhu Temple

  • DAY 2 - Drive From Shimla to Manali and camp stay Overnight

  • DAY 3 - Manali sightseeing

    Places:
    1. Solang Valley
    2. Hadimba Devi Temple
    3. Tibetan Monestry
    4. Madi

  • DAY 4 - Manali - Kasol and overnight stay at camp

    Places / Activities :
    1. Rafting
    2. Paragliding
    3. Shopping at Kullu Shawl Factory
    4. Madi

  • DAY 5 - Departure

    At the final day, pack your bags and other stuff and take a bus from the Manali Bus Stand.

  • ESCAPE TRIP ENDS HERE!

 What's Included

  Private Vehicle For Entire Package

  Hotel + Guest House Accomodation

  Rafting + Paragliding (Extra Charges Apply)

  Tour Guide

  Food - Breakfast / Dinner

 What's Not Included

  All the thing that are not mentioned in "What's Included" section

  Expense for activities other than mentioned above.

NOTE


  • Please be sure of the risks included in the adventure
  • Before undertaking the trek and trip, consult a physician.
